Class: MotionList

MotionList()

Creates a motion history object. It stores motion messages in a list and provides the function to get a list of recent motions.

Constructor

new MotionList()

Source:
  • motionhistory.js, line 29

Methods

addMotion(message)

Checks a message for motions and if a motion is included adds it to the motion list

Parameters:
Name Type Description
message Message

received message

clear()

Deletes all motion entries

getLatestMotionRoomList(relatedMotionTimespanInSecondsopt) → {Object}

Gets the last motion and all "related" motions. A motion is "related", if it happend nearly at the same time

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
relatedMotionTimespanInSeconds number <optional>
 5

time in seconds when a motion is a related motion
Source:
  • motionhistory.js, line 88
Returns:

with "timestamp" of the newes motion, motions and a "displayString" to print the motions
